LanguageData.VBE_Gin.label: gin
LanguageData.VBE_Gin.description: A particularly mild and colorless spirit, aromatically speaking this bottle has a pine-tree like scent as well as subtle fruity notes. This liquor has a reputation for being light-hearted and fun to drink and for causing what is known as “gin drunkenness”, during which one feels increased empathy and understanding.
LanguageData.VBE_Gin.tools.0.label: bottle
LanguageData.VBE_Gin.tools.1.label: neck
